verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Oh how I need Your grace
More than my words can say
Jesus I come, Jesus I come
In all my weaknesses
You are my confidence
Jesus I come, Jesus I come

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
I will rise, stand redeemed
Heaven open over me
To Your name eternally
Endless glory I will bring (oh)

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Oh what amazing love
We need Your cleansing flood
Jesus I come, Jesus I come
In every broken place
You are my righteousness
Jesus I come, Jesus I come

verse.name: c2
verse.lines:
I will rise, stand redeemed
Heaven open over me
To Your name eternally
Endless glory I will bring (oh)

verse.name: b1
verse.lines:
Thank You Jesus
Just as I am I come
Hallelujah
Oh what amazing love
Oh what amazing love
I will rise, stand redeemed
Heaven open over me
To Your name eternally
Endless glory I will bring
I will rise, stand redeemed
Heaven open over me
To Your name eternally
Endless glory I will bring (oh, oh)
